title: Festival Font (not the Logo!)
author: ulle

comments.content:
It must be **BetaSans (Bold)** by Joshua Distler [ShiftType, 1997]:  
 [http://www.shiftype.com/fontdetail.php?m=1&p=3](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317112152/http:/www.shiftype.com/fontdetail.php?m=1&p=3 "http://www.shiftype.com/fontdetail.php?m=1&p=3")
Thank you so much! That's exactly the font I'm looking for :)
